channel.title: mnemonics on Ernestas Poškus technical blog
channel.description: Recent content in mnemonics on Ernestas Poškus technical blog

item.title: Socket statistics
item.description: -n, –numeric | Do now try to resolve service names. -a, –all | Display all sockets. -e, –extended | Show detailed socket information -p, –processes | Show process using socket. -t, –tcp | Display only TCP sockets. -u, –udp | Display only UDP sockets. -l, –listening | Display only listening sockets (these are omitted by default). -4, –ipv4 | Display only IP version 4 sockets (alias for -f inet). -6, –ipv6 | Display only IP version 6 sockets (alias for -f inet6).
